text:
Hello everyone! I’m Oyshi.
 I’m currently pursuing a bachelor’s degree in Statistics, and alongside my studies I work as a Data Analytics TA at an edtech company. Because of my statistics background, I use R very frequently in both academic and practical settings.
I’m new here and interested in contributing—particularly around improving packages that support R users. I’m looking forward to learning from the community and contributing where I can.
Github:<https://github.com/mahjabinoyshi>
